settings.title: About OOSC
settings.text:
Retro-styled, technical ski, gym & swim wear made from recycled plastic bottles. #apreseveryday

Products: Ski Suits (Mens) (Womens), Mens Ski Jackets & Womens Ski Jackets . Oh, and brand new bikinis & mens swim shorts!

settings.subtitle: Go retro
settings.title: SUIT OF THE MONTH
settings.text:
Our Ricky Bobby ski suit was introduced to the OOSC collection in 2020/21, and became an immediate best-seller.

The 80's vibe is inspired by Talladega Nights...remember; if you ain't first, you're last!

settings.subtitle: BECOME A BRAND AMBASSADOR
settings.title: DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO BECOME AN OOSC BRAND AMBASSADOR?
settings.text: Join our very own ambassador programme! Complete different social media tasks and earn rewards such as cashback to spend in store, naming a future ski suit or even joining us on a European ski tour!

settings.title: SS22 SUSTAINABLE SWIM RANGE
settings.text: We've taken plastic out of the ocean and created a brand new sustainable swim wear range. Womens one piece swim suits, mens shorts and 16 different combs of bikini. Get involved.
